title: Undocumented, Unbanked Consumers Turn to Data-Rich Finance Allies for Auto Loans - PYMNTS.com
content: Undocumented, Unbanked Consumers Turn to Data-Rich Finance Allies for Auto Loans  PYMNTS.com
description: Tricolor Holdings CEO Daniel Chu discusses how alternative, data-rich underwriting models can support undocumented and unbanked consumers seeking out auto loans.
